amendment.description: An amendment numbered 28 printed in Part B of House Report 118-242 to eliminate funding for the Denali Commission.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to reduce funding for the Denali Commission by $17,000,000.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 316 (Roll no. 539).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Perry amendment (A013) Failed by recorded vote: 105 - 316 (Roll no. 539).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
